summary: "Blade Runner" is a 1982 sci-fi movie directed by Ridley Scott, based on Philip K. Dick's novel "Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?" Set in a future Los Angeles, it follows cop Rick Deckard (Harrison Ford) who hunts down escaped replicants (bio-engineered humans) led by Roy Batty (Rutger Hauer). Despite mixed reviews initially, it's now considered one of the best sci-fi films, known for its visuals and complex themes. The film's soundtrack was also nominated for awards. Over time, "Blade Runner" gained a cult following and spawned a sequel, "Blade Runner 2049," and an anime series, "Blade Runner: Black Lotus."
title: Blade Runner
